name: GherkinSpectacle
short_description:
Spectacle is a Gherkin tool that allows product owners, business users and other subject matter experts to browse the long living executable specifications of a project - the feature files. Spectacle enriches the user experience in viewing boring feature files in text format along with their live status at feature and scenario level.

Spectacle is an excellent companion during your sprint reviews or product demos to prove that all your scenarios captured during Product Backlog Refinement sessions are covered as part of automated acceptance tests and they are in fact successfully wired up to your source code and RAG status.
summary: Spectacle allows SMEs to browse Gherkin features and their RAG status
